item.description:
UPDATE: tickets will be available at the door from 5pm.

Call me on 617 863 7390 if you have any problems.

Art goes overtime on the first Friday of the month with guest DJs, live performance, gallery talks, specialty cocktails, and more.

$15 includes museum admission, live entertainment, and a complimentary drink 
FREE for ICA members

This event is 21+

  • Friday, August 3, 2012
    BRAZILIAN STREET PARTY
    Celebrate the opening of our Brazilian street art exhibition Os Gêmeos with a waterfront dance party! Caipirinhas, Brazilian street food and DJs will take visitors to the heart of the artists' native São Paulo.

http://www.icaboston.org/programs/first-fridays/

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: ICA First Fridays: Brazilian Street Party
